ResourceHeader.Description: Sodankylä Geophysical Observatory has been in operation since 1914. The data archive holdings include geomagnetic, ionosonde, cosmic ray, riometer, VLF, all-sky camera, and seismic data.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: NOTE: Our data are available free of charge for scientific and educational purposes. If our data are used for scientific publications, we require you to contact us in order to discuss under which conditions our data can be published, i.e. whether an acknowledgment of the Sodankylä Geophysical Observatory in your paper is sufficient or whether we require co-authorship. For detailed access to additional data, please contact our office or the observer in charge. See the detailed data license, https://www.sgo.fi/Data/licence.php
